name: Pokémon Crystallos
overview: Description: You're a kid raised in a far away island, but your adventure into the Ninguit Region starts with a little request from Professor Prudens, he found a particular frozen feather that can't be defrosted. As you make your way through different towns and cities to find out the origins of said feather you have the adventure of your life, as you're finally able to leave that isolated island. Features: • New region of Linguit
